texts: ['I ordered the wrong size tee and had difficulties returning it on the website. I contacted Tee Public and they responded almost immediately. Resolved my issue and sent me a new tee shirt. High praise for the excellent customer service!', "These guys offer the best customer service in all of retail! Their products are off high quality and there's a fantastic selection of design and product options.", "Looked for an obscure phrase on a shirt. Teepublic had it. The process was easy, and the quality is better than expected. Sizes are really true, which is so very rare anymore. Don't hesitate.", "My order arrived in a good timely fashion & the items I received were exactly on point. I purchased my items during TeePublic's sale/promotional period, which is the only time that I can afford to shop the site in this terrible economic climate, & so I definitely got a good deal on my items & I'm quite satisfied.", 'Always top notch customer service. Never have had an issue with any order I place. The latest was another great product- quick turnaround- happy customer!', "I have messaged sellers and get no response at all. However, TeePublic's customer service after I have a problem (which I was trying to avoid), well they have been great in handling my issues. The sellers seem lazy when replying to customers.", 'Great communication. They let me know it was a specialty order and had to be sent to out to get printed. Then they let me know when it was being shipped with tracking number. It arrived a day earlier then expected.', 'Very impressed with the quality, I had a hard time locating exactly what I wanted and was impressed with your selection. I will definitely be purchasing from you in the future. Thank you', 'Wonderful quality T-shirts for an amazing price. Both T-shirts were true to size and the colors are just as vibrant as advertised.I will be doing more shopping for tees and tank.Thanks.', 'The tee shirt is beautiful, just as pictured.It is a medium weight cotton shirt, much better quality than the junk you get from Amazon.', 'All my tees come from TeePublic. My larger size is always available. The tees and graphics are quality and I love the fact independent business owners are getting business from TeePublic. Very happy!', "I am SO glad the issues with the fit of the women's v-neck tees has been resolved! I ordered this style a couple of years ago and was very disappointed that the style ran quite small. But after seeing the notice that the issue had been resolved I decided to try again. I am so glad I gave it a second chance. The shirt I received is perfectly sized, AND it did not shrink in the wash! (I ordered 4 more designs.) Feeling very pleased with this new & improved fit & the shirt is exactly what I hoped for.", 'Very happy with the quality of the shirts. I love that there are so many different prints to choose from so I was able get a whole bunch of different shirts from this one website. Very convenient and reasonable price', 'Overall the merchandise was great but on one of the t-shirts, the application of the logo was so thin, you could see the color of the shirt through it. The shirt had a distressed look.', 'ordering was easy, prompt filling of order, when a problem arose it was handled quickly, professionally, and to my satisfaction. good job folks!', 'Tshirt designs unique and innovative. Which is why I continue to use and order from you. Shipping costs could be more attractive...', 'Soft fabric, great print quality, only downside is that the torso is rlly long, nothing scissors cant take care of!', "You did everything right! Shipping was quick and reasonable, and the shirts are awesome! Those are things I already knew to do and the response was not helpful at all.', "I love the design, quality of the shirt was great. the print was high quality, shipping was on time in a reallyfun custom mailer. The only thing that I will know better is that the Women's shirts run small.", 'Great shirt! Soft, beautiful, and fast to get to me. I would advise sizing up TWO sizes, not one, for a comfortable fit. This shirt runs rather small, especially in the arms. So it\'s a "goal shirt" for now! What actually arrived was (2) XXL navy blue shirts (the design was correct and the material was high quality).Since I happen to like navy blue, I thought I would at least try it on. The XXL was so tight it fit me like a large, while virtually any XL t-shirt fits me perfectly. I gave the (2) shirts away to friends who wear a size "large" and they love them. It would be nice be able to get the shirt I ordered, that fits. I just haven\'t been able to figure out how.', 'Great T. Felt worn in and cozy right away.', 'LOVE the style, size, cut of the tee!!', "My order was received in a timely manner and it was exactly what I needed. You've found a nice niche in what you sell. I don't know where else I could have found what I was looking for.", "I have no idea how good the print quality is, but the t-shirt quality is mediocre - thin, gauzy fabric. This isn't that kind of T that will last for years, but if you're looking for something niche to wear to a concert it's fine.", 'Great fit. Great graphics. High quality tee. Very pleased with purchase.', 'Excellent quality shirts. I honestly was expecting thin, cheap tee shirts but the fit, weight and overall quality is excellent. As soon as I got my first order I was on the site planning my next one.', 'Love the shirts and how fast they were delivered.', 'SUPER fast shipping and great quality for the price!', 'The printing is not solid.', 'I love the shirt, (Back and Body Aches) absolutely great. Fits perfect (I did size up for drying purposes). At first it went to my old address even though I changed my address, but customer service was great they immediately sent out another. 100% satisfied ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½', 'Love the quality. Time frame and service. Will yell friends about this company.Thanks.', 'Good merchandise and great quick delivery.', 'Tee Shirts could be made from better material,washedthe shirts and they shrunk one size ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½ï¿½', 'My T-shirts are true to size and they feel great! More orders being made soon!!', "I bought two tees for my husband. I haven't given them to him yet, but here's my first look. Showing the male models height and weight while wearing the actual shirts was very helpful when I was deciding on his size. Can't wait 'til I see his big smile when he gets them!", 'Shirt came ahead of schedule. Not much more I can say other than keep up the good work!', 'Great shirts and the shipping is pretty fast!', 'The Letters on the Sweater was in Bold Print on thesocial media advertisement... The quality seems good but I should have ordered a xl size. The large was a little tight through the shouolders.', 'The shirt came and it was great... But I washed it once and it shrunk 3" in length. I have bought from other vendors on TeePublic and they were fine, minimal shrinking. Watch what the material is made of, some are better quality than others.', 'Thw original shirt I ordered had a graphic I found to be a bit more blurry than what I saw online. Not only did they let me keep that shirt for free, I got to pick out a whole new shirt design that arrived and looks great! I know this review sound like some bot wrote it, but I assure you I am a real person. And TeePublic are real mfrs.', 'Bought one of my own shirts to check the quality. My account was removed from the platform shortly after receiving it for violating terms of service. I sent an appeal and have heard nothing back. Loved the shirt and would like to continue purchasing and selling through the platform but have been removed with no good reason as to why.', '...........', 'Ordered two printed black shirts (same design) for adult and small child. Mine was a dark black but Childs was more of a faded black. Design was also faded compared to mine. Not happy.', "I upsizes and yet it was still too small. They should suggest go up 2 sizes from us sizing, at lease on women's cut.", 'This most recent t-shirt order was received in just 5d, a big improvement over the previous order of 12d. If TeePublic wanted to improve, they should use a shipping service that has standard tracking. Both my orders were untrackable, because they used non-standard tracking numbers.', "Easy ordering process. Very affordable. I'm plus size and they offer flattering shirts. Just wish more colors were available in plus. Very quick delivery too. Shirt is super soft. Tags easily removed. Quality graphic.", "I'm a Trekkie who's also a sucker for a good Star Trek themed t-shirt, but as a result I have a drawer full of poor quality, ill fitting tees. The TeePublic shirt is not one of them: the shirt is soft and fits well, not too tight, not humongously loose. The graphic on the front is surprisingly, beautifully printed, no fuzzy lines, no blurred images, colors subtle but distinct. Shirt also arrived within a week of ordering. Will be looking for more graphics from this company.", 'T-shirts were processed quickly and delivered within days. Decent price compared to other T-shirt sites.Had one issue with one T-shirt being the wrong size, but a simple email with a picture sent to them and they have a new one on its way.', "I've bought many shirts from TeePublic and they always ship super quick, fit great, and are worth their price!", 'speedydelivery', "Received my shirt in record time! The shirt matches the online description and color. The only negative was the sizing. I ordered a Large ladies. It fits, but us definitely not a large. I washed it, but did not put it in the dryer - I was afraid of shrinkage, and I wouldn't be able to wear it. Next time, I will order a man's size. But, I do recommend this company and it's products", "I have ordered several times from Tee Public and 4 out of 4 times the print quality has been terrible. The last time the print looked like the color ink was so low in the screen that the print came out yellow instead of green. All the prints have hazy outlines or prints that are not very sharp in detail. This most likely caused by the screens being out of registration when the shirts are printed. I have a hard time understanding why the shirts were even sent out o me in the first place. It is almost like they dont do any quality checks. I'd give the quality 1 star but because they have always been very quick to respond and issue a refund i gave a 2 out of 5.", 'Hell damn ass pilots', 'I bought a t-shirt in white. It was a curvy women\'s size XXL. I didn\'t like the image on black or grey. Unfortunately the words (white) were not printed. But if I would have chosen the black then I wouldn\'t had the image printed. I wish there was a "looks best in ________(color)" description.', "I ordered a shirt & didn't fit right & It's being replaced & That's awesome ,I had no clue it be so easy Thank AgainMiss Charlotte", 'ýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýýý', "I love my tee shirt and that's all I have to say about that.", 'So impressed. I emailed and they emailed back the next day and took care of my problem without me even have to reiterate. So impressed. Thank you.', 'I hesitated purchasing the mug because there was no description indicating how many ounces it would hold.Also, the shipping cost was only $2 less than the actual cost of the mug itself.However,the photo on line appeared to be adequate and I really liked the picture of the players.Since it was a gift for a UCONN fan I decided to take my chances.I was quite disappointed when the mug arrived.The mug itself was small which in turn made the photo shot very small.', 'Unbelievable']
